chair.name: chair
chair.description: A seat for one person, typically with four legs and a back.

table.name: table
table.description: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs.

fridge.name: fridge
fridge.description: A refrigerator used to keep food and drinks cool.

door.name: door
door.description: A hinged or sliding barrier allowing entrance to or exit from an enclosure.

lamp.name: lamp
lamp.description: A device for giving light, with an electric bulb or other light source.

book.name: book
book.description: A written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together.
